frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-activity-app-launcher
frozen.shortDescription: Integrates a category-based application launcher in the activities window. IMPORTANT: it needs the 'gnome-menus' and 'libgnome-menu-3-dev'; they must be installed in the system before installing this extension.
frozen.longDescription: Integrates a category-based application launcher in the activities window. IMPORTANT: it needs the 'gnome-menus' and 'libgnome-menu-3-dev'; they must be installed in the system before installing this extension.
